quest.name: Mushroom Madness
journal: Something in the air has Ponnixia distressed.

Malevolent sylphs have been working their mischief on the forest's mushrooms, lacing them with a poisonous powder that coaxes them to emit toxic fumes. Wash them with spring water to spare the sylphs of Little Solace from a coughing epidemic.
You have doused the mushrooms, removing their poisonous properties. Inform Ponnixia she may breathe easy again.
Ponnixia takes a deep breath, savoring the clean, crisp forest air. Once again, you have proven yourself a true friend to Little Solace and its inhabitants.
objectives: Douse the greater banestools with spring water.

dialogue.name: PONNIXIA
dialogue.text: Just when this one thought touched ones couldn't get any nastier! Does friendly one smell something funny in the air?

dialogue.name: PONNIXIA
dialogue.text: This one saw touched ones scattering strange powder on stinkshrooms, making nasty stink even stinkier! These ones cannot stop sniffling and sneezing.

dialogue.name: PONNIXIA
dialogue.text: Please, friendly one! Wash nasty one's nasty powder off of stinkshrooms, before all of these ones become sickly ones.

dialogue.name: PONNIXIA
dialogue.text: Please, friendly one! Wash powder off of stinkshrooms, before all of these ones become sickly ones.

dialogue.name: PONNIXIA
dialogue.text: This one's nose has stopped tingling. Friendly one has cleaned stinkshrooms of their stink, yes?

dialogue.name: PONNIXIA
dialogue.text: These ones breathe a sigh of relief. Ahhhhhh, does friendly one not too love the sweet smells of the forest?
